import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpResponse } from '@angular/common/http'; import { FormBuilder, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { IEmailTemplate, EmailTemplate } from './email-template.model'; import { EmailTemplateService } from './email-template.service'; @Component({ selector: 'ic-email-template-update', templateUrl: './email-template-update.component.html', }) export class EmailTemplateUpdateComponent implements OnInit { isSaving?: boolean; createdDateDp: any; updatedDateDp: any; emailTPNames: any[] = []; editForm = this.fb.group({ id: [], emailTemplateName: ['', [Validators.required]], fromEmail: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.pattern('^\\w+([-+.]\\w+)*@\\w+([-.]\\w+)*\\.\\w+([-.]\\w+)*$')]], fromName: ['', [Validators.required]], emailSubject: ['', [Validators.required]], emailContent: ['', [Validators.required]], createdBy: [], createdDate: [], updatedBy: [], updatedDate: [], }); constructor(protected emailTemplateService: EmailTemplateService, protected activatedRoute: ActivatedRoute, private fb: FormBuilder) { this.emailTPNames = [ { templateId: 'email_tp_activation_email', templateName: 'email-activated' }, { templateId: 'email_tp_creation_email', templateName: 'email-created' }, { templateId: 'email_tp_password_reset_email', templateName: 'password-resetEmail' }, { templateId: 'email_tp_request_approved_email', templateName: 'request-approved' }, { templateId: 'email_tp_request_cancelled_email', templateName: 'request-cancelled' }, { templateId: 'email_tp_request_rejected_email', templateName: 'request-rejected' }, { templateId: 'email_tp_request_rollbacked_email', templateName: 'request-rollbacked' }, { templateId: 'email_tp_request_submitted_email', templateName: 'request-submitted' }, { templateId: 'email_tp_task_approved_email', templateName: 'task-approved' }, { templateId: 'email_tp_task_assgined_email', templateName: 'task-assgined' }, ]; } ngOnInit(): void { this.isSaving = false; this.activatedRoute.data.subscribe(({ emailTemplate }) => { this.updateForm(emailTemplate); }); } updateForm(emailTemplate: IEmailTemplate): void { this.editForm.patchValue({ id: emailTemplate.id, emailTemplateName: emailTemplate.emailTemplateName, fromEmail: emailTemplate.fromEmail, fromName: emailTemplate.fromName, emailSubject: emailTemplate.emailSubject, emailContent: emailTemplate.emailContent, createdBy: emailTemplate.createdBy, createdDate: emailTemplate.createdDate, updatedBy: emailTemplate.updatedBy, updatedDate: emailTemplate.updatedDate, }); } previousState(): void { window.history.back(); } save(): void { this.isSaving = true; const emailTemplate = this.createFromForm(); const emailTemplateId = this.emailTPNames.find( emailTP => emailTP.templateName === (this.editForm.get(['emailTemplateName']) as any).value ); if (emailTemplate.id !== undefined) { this.subscribeToSaveResponse(this.emailTemplateService.update(emailTemplate)); } else { emailTemplate.id = emailTemplateId.templateId; this.subscribeToSaveResponse(this.emailTemplateService.create(emailTemplate)); } } protected subscribeToSaveResponse(result: Observable>): void { result.subscribe( () => this.onSaveSuccess(), () => this.onSaveError() ); } protected onSaveSuccess(): void { this.isSaving = false; this.previousState(); } protected onSaveError(): void { this.isSaving = false; } private createFromForm(): IEmailTemplate { return { ...new EmailTemplate(), id: (this.editForm.get(['id']) as any).value, emailTemplateName: (this.editForm.get(['emailTemplateName']) as any).value, fromEmail: (this.editForm.get(['fromEmail']) as any).value, fromName: (this.editForm.get(['fromName']) as any).value, emailSubject: (this.editForm.get(['emailSubject']) as any).value, emailContent: (this.editForm.get(['emailContent']) as any).value, createdBy: (this.editForm.get(['createdBy']) as any).value, createdDate: (this.editForm.get(['createdDate']) as any).value, updatedBy: (this.editForm.get(['updatedBy']) as any).value, updatedDate: (this.editForm.get(['updatedDate']) as any).value, }; } }
